headline.main: Draghi Sees Brexit Vote Hitting Euro Zone Growth by Up to 0.5 Percent Over 3 Years-Official
headline.print_headline: Draghi Sees Brexit Vote Hitting Euro Zone Growth by Up to 0.5 Percent Over 3 Years-Official

docs.snippet: European Central Bank President Mario Draghi told EU leaders on Tuesday that Britain's decision to leave the EU could reduce euro zone growth by a cumulative 0.3 to 0.5 percent compared to previous estimates over the next three years, an EU offici...
docs.lead_paragraph: European Central Bank President Mario Draghi told EU leaders on Tuesday that Britain's decision to leave the EU could reduce euro zone growth by a cumulative 0.3 to 0.5 percent compared to previous estimates over the next three years, an EU official said.

headline.main: Zimbabwe Restores Electricity After Losing Half of Its Daily Supply
headline.print_headline: Zimbabwe Restores Electricity After Losing Half of Its Daily Supply

docs.snippet: Zimbabwe restored electricity on Tuesday after earlier losing half of its daily supply following a technical hitch that disrupted business in an economy struggling to overcome a commodities downturn and severe drought....
docs.lead_paragraph: Zimbabwe restored electricity on Tuesday after earlier losing half of its daily supply following a technical hitch that disrupted business in an economy struggling to overcome a commodities downturn and severe drought.

headline.main: Supreme Court Leans Left in Term Unsettled by Scalia's Death
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Leans Left in Term Unsettled by Scalia's Death

docs.snippet: Justice Antonin Scalia's sudden death transformed the Supreme Court's term, shifted power to its liberal wing and started a transition that will be greatly affected by who wins the presidency....
docs.lead_paragraph: Justice Antonin Scalia's sudden death transformed the Supreme Court's term, shifted power to its liberal wing and started a transition that will be greatly affected by who wins the presidency.

headline.main: Man Who Went on Mac and Cheese Tirade Is Arrested in Florida
headline.print_headline: Man Who Went on Mac and Cheese Tirade Is Arrested in Florida

headline.main: A Fourth Gold the Rio Lure for Walsh Jennings
headline.print_headline: A Fourth Gold the Rio Lure for Walsh Jennings

headline.main: Iraq's Top Court Invalidates Abadi's Partial Cabinet Reshuffle
headline.print_headline: Iraq's Top Court Invalidates Abadi's Partial Cabinet Reshuffle

docs.snippet: A top Iraqi court on Tuesday declared unconstitutional a parliament session in which deputies had approved a partial cabinet reshuffle, scrapping Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi's clearest gain in a months-long political crisis....
docs.lead_paragraph: A top Iraqi court on Tuesday declared unconstitutional a parliament session in which deputies had approved a partial cabinet reshuffle, scrapping Prime Minister Haider al-Abadi's clearest gain in a months-long political crisis.

headline.main: Two Moms, Four Children Killed in Fiery California Car Crash
headline.print_headline: Two Moms, Four Children Killed in Fiery California Car Crash

docs.snippet: Two mothers and their four children were killed early on Tuesday after their minivan was struck from behind by a tractor-trailer and burst into flames as it tumbled down an embankment north of Los Angeles, the California Highway Patrol said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two mothers and their four children were killed early on Tuesday after their minivan was struck from behind by a tractor-trailer and burst into flames as it tumbled down an embankment north of Los Angeles, the California Highway Patrol said.
